metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11700 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A hyperlink using the res: protocol can be used to open local files at a known location in Internet Explorer if a user approves execution when prompted. *Note: this issue only occurs on Windows. Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 67.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine chrisccoulson> Windows only bug

criterions.comment: mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
